text: Diego Novelli (born 22 May 1931) is an Italian politician. He was born in Turin. Novelli was a member of the Italian Communist Party. He was a Member of the European Parliament from 1984 to 2001. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 2001. Novelli was Mayor of Turin from 1975 to 1985. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Turin Category:Italian mayors Category:MEPs for Italy
title: Diego Novelli
